p: The authors of [ 113] describe the results of studying the antiviral characteristics (against avian influenza - H 5N 1) of extracts of five Asian medicinal plants ( Andrographis paniculata, Curcuma longa, Gynostemma pentaphyllum, Kaempferia parviflora, Psidium guajava). Both water and ethanol extracts from all the plants studied showed significant antiviral activity against H 5N 1 virus, but the authors name C. longa and K. parviflora the most active ones.
